homeIntro: Explore my work and get to know me better.
aboutDescription: I am an organized and motivated individual with a wide range of interests. I am passionate about programming and constantly seek creative solutions to challenges. As an electronic engineering student, I enjoy learning new tools and skills. I consider myself outgoing, proactive, and skilled in both leadership and teamwork, allowing me to adapt to various environments and challenges.
resumeDescription: Explore a comprehensive overview of my professional journey, showcasing essential skills and achievements. Utilize the 'View' and 'Download' options to access my full resume and dive deeper into my qualifications.
contactIntro: Feel free to reach out through the following channels for any inquiries, collaborations, or just to chat about projects and ideas. I'm always open to new opportunities and challenges, whether in web development, programming, or any technology-related field. If you have a proposal or are interested in working together, don't hesitate to contact me.
interestsDescription: My interests span a variety of disciplines that enrich my creative and technical approach. I have musical ear training, experience in classical piano, guitar, and singing. I've also attended theater and artistic drawing workshops, which have allowed me to develop an aesthetic vision and personal expression. Additionally, I practice martial arts, such as Taekwondo, which has instilled discipline and perseverance. On the technical side, I enjoy experimenting with technology, like Arduino Uno, combining creativity with technical skills.
projectsSubtitle: Browse through a selection of projects that showcase my journey in web development. From engaging sites built with Elementor to custom React components, these projects highlight my evolving skill set and creative problem-solving abilities.

fender.name: Fender Website
fender.description: A fully responsive website developed for Fender, featuring a dynamic and user-friendly experience. Built using WordPress and Elementor, the site includes a comprehensive blog section, a secure checkout cart, and a sandbox environment for test purchases. The design ensures seamless navigation across devices, providing an engaging platform for exploring Fender products and content.

calculator.name: JavaScript Calculator
calculator.description: A React-based calculator featuring a clean and intuitive interface. It supports basic arithmetic operations and handles edge cases like excessive digits and decimal inputs gracefully. The calculator includes buttons for numbers, operators, and functions like clear and evaluate, providing a seamless user experience for performing calculations.

quote.name: Random Quote Machine
quote.description: A React-based application designed to provide users with random inspirational quotes. The interface includes a prominent display area for the quote and its author, along with interactive buttons to fetch a new quote or share it on Twitter. The application retrieves quotes from an external API, ensuring a fresh and engaging experience each time the user interacts with the app.

clock.name: 25 + 5 Clock
clock.description: A React-powered Pomodoro timer that helps manage time effectively by alternating between 25-minute work sessions and 5-minute breaks. The clock features adjustable session and break lengths, start/stop controls, and a reset button. It also includes visual and audio alerts to signal the end of each session, making it ideal for enhancing productivity and time management.

markdown.name: Markdown Previewer
markdown.description: This React application allows users to write and preview Markdown text in real-time. It features an editor where users can input Markdown, and a preview pane that displays the rendered HTML. This tool is useful for quickly visualizing Markdown formatting and includes support for headers, code blocks, lists, links, and images.

pokemon.name: Pokémon Search App
pokemon.description: A dynamic Pokémon Search App designed to provide users with detailed information about any Pokémon by name or ID. The application features a clean and intuitive interface, allowing users to easily search for Pokémon and view their details, including name, ID, weight, height, and various base stats like HP, attack, and defense. Users can also see the Pokémon’s sprite and types.

register.name: Cash Register
register.description: A functional Cash Register application designed to handle transactions and provide accurate change calculations. The app features an interactive interface where users can enter the amount of cash received from a customer and process a purchase. It calculates the change due based on predefined denominations and updates the cash drawer display accordingly.

telephone.name: Telephone Number Validator
telephone.description: A Telephone Number Validator application that verifies whether a given US phone number is valid. Users can input a phone number, and the application will check its format against a defined regular expression to determine its validity. The results are displayed on the screen, indicating whether the number is valid or not.

palindrome.name: Palindrome Checker
palindrome.description: A Palindrome Checker application that verifies whether a given word or phrase is a palindrome. Users can input text, and the application will evaluate whether the text reads the same forward and backward, disregarding spaces, punctuation, and capitalization. The result is displayed on the screen, informing the user if the input is a palindrome or not.

roman.name: Roman Numeral Converter
roman.description: A Roman Numeral Converter application that allows users to convert Arabic numbers (integers) into Roman numerals. The application is capable of handling numbers within the range of 1 to 3999, ensuring that only valid inputs are processed. Users can input a number, and upon clicking the 'Convert' button, the corresponding Roman numeral is displayed on the screen.

product.name: Product Landing Page
product.description: A responsive Product Landing Page built with HTML and CSS, showcasing Fender’s 70th Anniversary Stratocaster® Collection. The page features a fixed header with navigation, leading to sections like Description, Features with an embedded video, and a Sign-Up Form. The design is sleek, professional, and fully responsive, providing an optimal user experience across all devices.

drum.name: Drum Machine
drum.description: A React-based drum machine that features an interactive interface for playing and experimenting with drum sounds. The application includes a set of drum pads, each mapped to specific keyboard keys and sounds. Users can click on the pads or press the corresponding keys to trigger the sounds, with the currently played sound displayed on the screen.

technical.name: Technical Documentation Page
technical.description: A technical documentation page dedicated to HTML, featuring a structured layout with a fixed navigation bar for easy access to key topics such as HTML elements, attributes, document structure, and more. The content is organized into sections with clear headers, providing a concise yet comprehensive overview of HTML fundamentals.

survey.name: Survey Form
survey.description: A survey form for LinkedIn members designed to collect user feedback with a clean and intuitive interface. The form includes fields for personal information, role selection, and preferences, as well as options for recommending LinkedIn and suggesting improvements.

tribute.name: Tribute Page
tribute.description: A tribute page dedicated to Lola Mora, featuring a well-organized layout that highlights her remarkable contributions to art and culture. It presents a detailed timeline of her life and achievements in a clean, readable format. The design employs a minimalist approach, creating a visually appealing and respectful tribute.

icons.css3: A stylesheet language used to style HTML documents.
icons.js: A versatile programming language for building interactive web pages.
icons.rn: A framework for building native apps using React.
icons.bstrap: A popular CSS framework for responsive web design.
icons.vscode: A powerful code editor developed by Microsoft.
icons.git: A version control system for tracking changes in source code.
icons.github: A platform for hosting and managing Git repositories.
icons.wpress: A content management system for building websites.
icons.elementor: A drag-and-drop page builder for WordPress.
icons.arduino: An open-source platform for building electronic projects.
icons.sass: A CSS preprocessor for writing more maintainable stylesheets.
icons.jquery: A fast, small, and feature-rich JavaScript library.
icons.nodejs: A runtime for building server-side applications in JavaScript.
icons.npm: A package manager for JavaScript and Node.js.
icons.figma: A cloud-based design tool for UI/UX design.
icons.illustrator: A vector graphics editor by Adobe.
icons.photoshop: A raster graphics editor by Adobe.
